comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Another prize winner in the "Physical and Mental Perfection Contest" held by the National Conference on Race Betterment.  Alvin was almost three years old, and was from Battle Creek like most of the other winners, including Virginia June Nay, featured a couple weeks back in the Commons uploads.
